lines.text: They fed the goat a bunch of red stuff, and then had it vomit all over the body!
No, no. That ain't goat vomit. I know goat vomit, and that ain't it.
Much as blood stinks, it's a different kind of stink.
You ain't spent a single day on a farm, have you?
Right on. I have pitched no forks and poked no cows.
But- okay, yeah, that idea was gross and dumb. But...
It could still be the goat's blood!
N-not likely. There are no visible wounds on the- the animal.
So they fed it poison and made it throw up bloo-
Nope. Not that. Movin' away from that idea.
